mapper.insert: insert into TBL_STUDY_BOARD (STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, STUDY_START_DATE, STUDY_DATE, STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE) values (SEQ_STUDY_NUMBER.nextval,#{studyTitle},#{studyProcess},#{studyStartDate},#{studyDate},#{studyStudentCount},#{studyMajor},#{studyAddress},#{studyContent},#{userNumber},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM,STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, TO_CHAR(STUDY_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS STUDY_START_DATE , STUDY_DATE,STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE,USER_ID,USER_NICKNAME FROM (select ROWNUM AS RNUM,STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, STUDY_START_DATE, STUDY_DATE,STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, S.USER_NUMBER,STUDY_REGISTER_DATE,STUDY_UPDATE_DATE,U.USER_ID,U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_STUDY_BOARD S JOIN TBL_USERS U ON S.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.page} * #{criteria.amount} and s.user_number=#{userNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ROWNUM desc) WHERE RNUM > (#{criteria.page} - 1) * #{criteria.amount}
